data.title: Using Abstract
data.subtitle: Abstract lets you manage, version, and document your designs in one place.

data.title: Manage your account
data.subtitle: Configure your account settings, such as your email, profile details, and password.

data.title: Manage organizations, teams, and projects
data.subtitle: Use Abstract organizations, teams, and projects to organize your people and your work.

data.title: Authenticate to Abstract
data.subtitle: Set up and configure SSO, SCIM, and Just-in-Time provisioning.

data.title: Abstract support
data.subtitle: Get in touch with a human.
